mapper.select: SELECT bsp.id AS productId, bsp.product_name AS productName, bsp.image, bpt.unit_name AS unitName, bsp.sell_price AS sellPrice, bsp.adjusted_price as adjustedPrice, bsp.modity_price_time as modityPriceTime, bs.storefront_name as storefrontName, bs.system_logo as systemLogo FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront bs ON bs.id=bsp.storefront_id WHERE bsp.id =#{productId}

SELECT a.image, a.id AS productId, a.product_name AS productName, e.storefront_name AS storefrontName, a.sell_price AS sellPrice, b.unit_name AS unitName FROM dj_basics_storefront_product a, dj_basics_product_template b, dj_basics_goods c, dj_basics_storefront e WHERE a.prod_template_id=b.id AND b.goods_id=c.id AND e.id=a.storefront_id AND c.type=3 AND a.city_id=#{cityId}
